text: The Green Party of the United States (GPUS) is a left-wing political party in the United States. The Green Party nominated Dr. Jill Stein as its candidate for President of the United States in 2012, and again in 2016. The party focuses on issues such as social justice and environmentalism. It is the sixth largest party in the country, following the American Independent Party, Libertarian Party, and the New York Independence Party. ==Related pages== * List of political parties in the United States * Ajamu Baraka * Cynthia McKinney * Jill Stein * Howie Hawkins * Angela Nicole Walker ==References== == Other websites == *Green Party official website Category:2001 establishments in the United States
title: Green Party of the United States
